## dull Widgets

Here is the widgets shiny example reworked using dull,

```{R message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include=FALSE}
library(dull)
```

```R
shinyApp(
  ui = container(
    row(
      col(
        card(
          cardBlock(
            title = "Action button",
            button(
              id = "action",
              label = "Click!"
            )
          ),
          cardBlock(
            title = "Current value:",
            verbatimTextOutput("actionOut")
          )
        )
      ),
      col(
        card(
          cardBlock(
            title = "Checkbox",
            checkboxInput(
              id = "checkbox",
              label = "Choice A",
              value = "A",
              checked = TRUE
            )
          ),
          cardBlock(
            title = "Current value:",
            verbatimTextOutput("checkboxOut")
          )
        )
      ),
      col(
        card(
          cardBlock(
            title = "Checkboxes",
            checkboxInput(
              id = "checkboxes",
              labels = c("Choice 1", "Choice 2", "Choice 3"),
              values = 1:3
            )
          ),
          cardBlock(
            title = "Current value:",
            verbatimTextOutput("checkboxesOut")
          )
        )
      )
    ),
    row(
      col(
        card(
          cardBlock(
            title = "Number (numeric)",
            numberInput(
              id = "number"
            )
          ),
          cardBlock(
            title = "Current value:",
            verbatimTextOutput("numberOut")
          )
        )
      ),
      col(
        card(
          cardBlock(
            title = "Radio",
            radioInput(
              id = "radio",
              labels = c("Choice 1", "Choice 2", "Choice 3"),
              values = 1:3
            )
          ),
          cardBlock(
            title = "Current value:",
            verbatimTextOutput("radioOut")
          )
        )
      ),
      col(
        card(
          cardBlock(
            title = "Checkbox bar",
            checkboxInput(
              id = "bar",
              bar = TRUE,
              labels = c("Choice 1", "Choice 2", "Choice 3"),
              values = 1:3
            )
          ),
          cardBlock(
            title = "Current value:",
            verbatimTextOutput("barOut")
          )
        )
      )
    ),
    row(
      col(
        card(
          cardBlock(
            title = "Select",
            id = "select",
            selectInput(
              option(
                "Choose a value", 
                selected = TRUE
              ),
              option("Choice 1", 1),
              option("Choice 2", 2),
              option("Choice 3", 3)
            )
          ),
          cardBlock(
            title = "Current value:",
            verbatimTextOutput("selectOut")
          )
        )
      ),
      col(
        card(
          cardBlock(
            title = "Input group",
            groupInput(
              id = "group",
              value = "cats",
              left = button(
                label = "Yay?", 
                value = "yay"
              ),
              right = button(
                label = "Nay?", 
                value = "nay"
              )
            )
          ),
          cardBlock(
            title = "Current value:",
            verbatimTextOutput("groupOut")
          )
        )
      ),
      col(
        card(
          cardBlock(
            title = "Input group (dropdown)",
            groupInput(
              id = "groupDown",
              value = "keywords",
              right = dropdown(
                align = "right",
                dropdownHeader("What to do?"),
                dropdownItem(
                  label = "Do this", 
                  value = "this"
                ),
                dropdownItem(
                  label = "Do that",
                  value = "that"
                ),
                dropdownItem(
                  label = "Both", 
                  value = "both"
                ),
                dropdownDivider(),
                dropdownItem(
                  label = "Other", 
                  value = "other"
                )
              )
            )
          ),
          cardBlock(
            title = "Current value:",
            verbatimTextOutput("groupDownOut")
          )
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  server = function(input, output) {
    output$actionOut <- renderPrint(input$action)
    
    output$checkboxOut <- renderPrint(input$checkbox)
    
    output$checkboxesOut <- renderPrint(input$checkboxes)
    
    output$numberOut <- renderPrint(input$number)
    
    output$radioOut <- renderPrint(input$radio)
    
    output$barOut <- renderPrint(input$bar)
    
    output$selectOut <- renderPrint(input$select)
    
    output$groupOut <- renderPrint(input$group)
    
    output$groupDownOut <- renderPrint(input$groupDown)
  }
)
```
